name: #20 Srikandi
description:
Androgynous princess of Cempalareja and the daughter of King Drupada. Srikandi is also known as the Warrior Princess of Madukara, Arjuna's kingdom. In previous live, Srikandi was Amba, a Princess who died with raging vengeance on Bhisma.

In The Great War, Srikandi was the one fated to defeat Bhisma, the Great Warrior of Kurava, fulfilling late Amba's prayer to the God Shiva. Srikandi was killed by Aswatama in the 18th day of the war.
